previewArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City 4, Montreal Impact 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A pair of clubs who have had a brief tempestuous relationship meet when Sporting Kansas City play host to the Montréal Impact on Saturday evening at Sporting Park.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF:  Sporting Kansas City vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.desc: Troy Perkns (Montreal Impact) kicks away the ball from Sal Zizzo.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Troy Perkins slides to stop an incoming Sal Zizzo

timelineItems.desc: Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) is substituted into the game for Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City). Bieler approaches goal and takes a shot, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Claudio Bieler enters the game and springs into action, but shoots wide

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Stina Hergott
timelineItems.text: A moment of silence for the victims of the #jccshooting. Could've heard a pin drop. #sportingkc #kc #ibelieve

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Go time between @SportingKC and @impactmontreal. Follow along here: http://t.co/4RTzAUXynV #SKCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Le match est en cours. | The game is underway. Allez Montréal ! #IMFClive http://t.co/G7wAaYzoj1

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Le match est en cours. | The game is underway. Allez Montréal ! #IMFClive http://t.co/G7wAaYzoj1

timelineItems.name: lawnturtle
timelineItems.text: At my first #sportingkc game! Thanks @leigh0725

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Bandon Decker
timelineItems.text: Why are we wearing an alternate kit at home? #SKC

timelineItems.name: meagan_eisman
timelineItems.text: First Sporting game with Steph! #KC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Il arrive ce que l'on savait qu'il arriverait, KC étouffe #IMFC avec une pression très haute et un rythme de jeu élevé.

timelineItems.name: Bryan Schumacher
timelineItems.text: Colin loves the third kits because he can pop his collar again. #SKC

timelineItems.desc: Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) shoots from the center of the box, but the shot is saved by Eric Kronberg (Sporting Kansas City)
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Eric Kronberg quick to shut down MTL attack

timelineItems.name: Daniel Statesel
timelineItems.text: I love these black kits #SKCvsMTL #Skc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Felipe Martins.
Attempt saved. Collen Warner (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Sébastien Laplante
timelineItems.text: Je connais pas bien la #MLS mais pour moi quand un gars a un match joué et un but, il est partant @JackMcInerney9 #ImpactTVASports #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Passé de trop... Passé de trop... L'angle de MDV était meilleur que celui de Felipe. Le repli d'Olum joue gros

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Chance Myers.

timelineItems.name: Chris M.
timelineItems.text: Collin, the savior. #SKC �

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: So far so good, malgré l'occasion ratée. C'est comme ça faut jouer sur la route. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Michelle Watson
timelineItems.text: Does Collin actually get a save for that? #SportingKC #SKCvsMTL

timelineItems.name: Justin Mayhugh
timelineItems.text: How's Felipe finding so much space out wide? #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: SentinelleMTL
timelineItems.text: La famille de @EMillllllllller est à Kansas City ce soir ! #IMFC #SportingKC http://t.co/WnWlbXTBTs

timelineItems.name: Kaitlyn Moore
timelineItems.text: I like Easter weekend cause it's the only time I get to call @b_feilhaber22 the Easter Benny�� #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Hâte de voir le travail de Mallace. J'aimais bien son potentiel #imfc #SKCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Mike Kuhn
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC wearing white arm bands in remembrance of the JCC shooting victims

timelineItems.comment: Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Vince Liccar
timelineItems.text: Royals in the afternoon. Sporting KC in the evening. Today doesn't suck. #SportingKC http://t.co/DSXExv3QxP

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 4, Montreal Impact 0.

timelineItems.name: Adam Gardner
timelineItems.text: The Impact's defense looks like the "other" brand in a paper towel commercial. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Correct me if I'm wrong, but that's #SportingKC's first win in those great argyle kits? #SKCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Captain Koko
timelineItems.text: THE BLACK ARGYLE IS GOOD LUCK NOW YOU GUYS. #sportingKC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Désolant. #IMFC Mais c'est pas grave, Canadiens en 4

timelineItems.desc: A pair of clubs who have had a brief tempestuous relationship meet when Sporting Kansas City play host to the Montréal Impact on Saturday evening at Sporting Park.

Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber with the laziest pass to Sinovic, ripped by Mapp, another chance for #IMFC. Can easily tell #SportingKC haven't played in 14 days.

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tennant
timelineItems.text: #rowdycrowd #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Emmanuel Merceron
timelineItems.text: Hônnetement on me donne le choix pour le #FCNantes entre Mapp et Bedoya, je prends Mapp sans hésiter... #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: The only player showing any urgency at all for #SportingKC is Zusi. Collin just gave everyone the "speed it up" signal. #SKCvMTL #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: About to kick off! #sportingkc vs #montrealimpact! We are here to win. #mlscup #champions and all. #wedefendtogether ;D

timelineItems.name: jonniesantana
timelineItems.text: At it again.... #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: MegB

timelineItems.name: Skander Mouelhi
timelineItems.text: #IMFC pas de stabilité on recommence le XI partant à chaque semaine est ce que Kolpas sait ce qu'il fait? je doute!

timelineItems.name: MARIA.
timelineItems.text: Pretty surprised by this lineup tonight, let's hope for the 3 Pointsss! Were still looking for that win! #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Tim Stout
timelineItems.text: OMG this is hard to watch #SKC

timelineItems.name: FOX 4 Sports
timelineItems.text: Very nice tribute to JCCC shooting victims at Sporting Park. A friend of Reat Underwood sang national anthem #reatunderwood #SportingKC

timelineItems.text: CSC pour Mallace finalement. L'insulte à l'injure. Dommage, car on tient le fort + que décemment dans ce match. Besoin d'un break. #imfclive

timelineItems.text: We want #JackMack we want #JackMack #IMFC @JackMcInerney9

timelineItems.text: C'est vrai j'oubliais; marco schallibaum était pas l'homme de la situation.... Avec Frank c'est beaucoup mieux.... #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.text: Le polo de golf du #SportingKC, c'est carton jaune, non? #IMFC

timelineItems.text: Miller là, on peut l'assoir sur le banc un peu, question qui voit un peu ce que ça prend. Je vois pas ce qu'il a de plus que Brovsky #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Besler and Collin are going to easily each cross 100 completed passes in this game. It's been that awesome. #SKCvMTL #SportingKC

timelineItems.text: Zusi and Dwyer are completely dominating #IMFC right flank, but the D keeps trying to bring out the ball over that side. I don't get it.

timelineItems.text: Such a perfect night to be at sporting park. Now let's score another goal for insurance. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Maybe I watched too much Sunderland this week and I’m now spoiled, but I wasn't impressed by that first half. #SKCvMTL #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: X. Squarre
timelineItems.text: Je changerais juste Felipe par JackMac à la mi-temps. Les reste c'est "ok". #imfc #imfclive

timelineItems.name: jsbournival
timelineItems.text: clamez vous tout le monde. #imfc est prudent. on protège notre défaite de 1-0.

timelineItems.name: Faiz Imam
timelineItems.text: @Section_126 Warner? Nope. Romero? Nope. Smith? Nope. This team needs to sign a LW BAD. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matteo
timelineItems.text: Ouch mais vrai RT"@SoccerSansF: Faut jouer à 16heures comme ça on passe à autre chose en soirée... #IMFC #SKCvMTL"

timelineItems.text: I must be the only person in KC that’s not in love with the #MLS or #SportingKC

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday evening Eastern Conference match between Sporting KC and the Montreal Impact. Will Jack McInerney strike again? Can Montreal defend Sporting's set pieces? Find out Saturday at 830pm ET on MLS Live.
timelineItems.title: Sporting KC vs. Montreal Impact April 19, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Sporting Kansas City 1, Montreal Impact 0.
